page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES (2)
page.content:
{I WENT TO CALIFORNIA { This game is for ten or more people. You get in a circle and one person gets in the middle and skips around. Then the person stops at somebody and puts her hands on her hips and shakes her hips, then turns that person round and shakes her hips again. Then you are ready to play the game again.
{I went to California { To see a summer fair, { I met a Senorita { With flowers in her hair. { Oh! Hipsy hipsy hipsy hipsy hipsy { Turn around, { Hipsy hipsy hipsy hipsy hipsy { Touch the ground. {
